Package com.okta.scim.database

Interface UserDatabase

  • All Superinterfaces:
    org.springframework.data.repository.CrudRepository<User,java.lang.Long>, Database<User>, org.springframework.data.jpa.repository.JpaRepository<User,java.lang.Long>, org.springframework.data.repository.PagingAndSortingRepository<User,java.lang.Long>, org.springframework.data.repository.query.QueryByExampleExecutor<User>, org.springframework.data.repository.Repository<User,java.lang.Long>

public interface UserDatabase
extends Database<User>
    Interface for the User Database
